Other Events
As with many Golf and Country Clubs, Coral Springs Country Club offers special dining and event services for golf tournaments. From serving our daily golfer to receptions or award dinners, we offer the food and beverage options desired for a first-class event. We can make your event a one-of-a-kind experience remembered fondly by all.
Our space is ideal for:
Wedding ceremonies & receptions
Plated & buffet dinner receptions
Wedding rehearsal dinners
Award luncheons and dinners
Business Meetings
​Church retreats
Holiday parties
Birthday parties
Bar Mitzvah & Bat Mitzvah
And much more!

About The Country Club of Coral Springs
Our newly renovated 18-hole championship (par 71) course is in great shape and features some of the best greens in South Florida; fast, true, and smooth. The tee-to-green distances present a challenge to men, women and youth of all skill levels, ranging from a comfortable 5,331 on up to a challenging 6,779 yards from the tips. Our Course Superintendent is instrumental in maintaining the club’s reputation for having the ‘truest’ greens in South Florida!
Situated among the woods and waterways in one of the city’s most distinctive residential neighborhoods, our course facilities include a secluded practice range, short game area, practice putting green and two course comfort stations. The Club is also one of only a few courses in the area which continues to extend walking privileges to the active community during ‘off-peak’ times at the discretion of the golf Pro Shop personnel. Come out and experience a relaxed golf atmosphere that you will truly enjoy.
We can meet your needs
With a unique layout offering varying challenges for every player, The Country Club of Coral Springs is proud to be your top option for a round of golf in Broward County. Our quality food and beverage service will keep you well fed and hydrated while you improve your game or try for your lowest round ever. Forget something important like balls, tees or even a club? Pick it up in the pro shop then head out to the first tee.
We offer tournament events for men and women of all skill levels. Inter-club leagues are very popular among members and daily players. We take pleasure in the fact that, year in and year out, our men and women’s teams are consistent contenders for top honors.
Call the Pro Shop today at:
(954) 752-4500
!

Golf Membership Information
Brand New Clubhouse
Membership
Have you seen our new look?! You’re invited to join as a Member to experience everything we have to offer! New Clubhouse, Fitness Training Facility, Course Renovations, and more! A great fit for junior golfers, families, young professionals, and retirees!
To learn more about our membership opportunities please contact Cheryl Tolin.
954-752-4500 ext. 5 or fill out the Membership Request form on this page.
Camaraderie
There are games both weekdays and weekends for all ages and handicaps to participate in…………. develop friendships that last a lifetime.
Newly Renovated Golf Course
Please contact us today to discuss new membership opportunities that best suit your lifestyle.
To join our waiting list for membership please contact Corey Henry at (954) 752-4500 ext 4 or
[email protected]
